summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for, the licensing and regulating of certain occupations, businesses, vocations, trades, callings, amusements, places of amusement, exhibitions, entertainments, animals, motor vehicles, boats, places and establishments; amending Section 13 of The License Code (Ordinance No. 48022) relating to applications for and issuance of licenses, and repealing Section 265 of said Code relating to the form of Tobacco Retailer's License.
